idea: The company is involved in two separate fields; Food industry and Agricultural inputs. In agricultural inputs, we are developing chemical and biochemical based materials to be used for enhancing growth of plants and crops. Also looking at bio-organic plant protection system. In processed food industries we are looking at technologies that will help in production of innovative food products that would be healthy alternative to conventional products.
name: Chemicalli Enterprises LLP

idea:
Mojek is being built as a financial super-app. It is designed to be a simple, fun place to get an overview of your financial life and to make informed decisions about your assets and expenses. It aims to enhance and simplify the financial possibilities of its users.

Mojek help track investments & expenses. We aim to connect directly with the user's bank accounts to tag, organise, and label expenses. This will give users the bigger picture of their spending habits across cards and accounts.

Managing your money isn’t the easiest thing to do. Now that many of us no longer make balance sheets, tracking and keeping up with the bank balance can get a little difficult. Mojek can connect with your bank account and help you keep up with your spending. Moreover, it can help you pinpoint areas that you’ve been spending, track upcoming bill, and keep up with your credit score, investment portfolio and give actionable insights.

Mojek helps bring your full financial life in one place automatically. You can connect with financial institutions you use to bring together your balances, holdings, and transaction history. You can do this across market categories: whether you want to track stocks, crypto, mutual funds, bank accounts, or NFTs, all of which are tracked and updated daily. It allows you to compare your own portfolio to major market benchmarks to determine whether you’re on track to meet your investment goals.

No more wasting time logging into multiple apps & websites to stay on top of your finances.
name: MOJEK SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are a group of AI enthusiasts collaborating to establish a research lab for AI and deep tech with the goal of identifying widespread challenges in the enterprises and developing solutions to transform the operations and bring them closer to the customer.
